_comment: Created by EFisher on 24/01/2014 16:54:08 using v2.0
title: What do staff say about support from their managers and how has it changed?
analysis_commentary: This question in the staff survey asks people to rank how supportive their managers are on a scale of 1 to 5 where a score of 1 represents unsupportive managers and 5 represents supportive managers. The average score has varied very little since 2007. There has also been very little variation between different trust types. The national report (please see 'About this data' for more details) states that in 2012, 65% of staff said they were satisfied with the support they got from their immediate manager.
data_source: Department of Health, Survey of NHS staff
